content: love is a blanket size approx 24 x 30 materials euro baby babe softcotton chunky 100g/153 yds 4 skeins size 9 & 10 24 or 32 circular needles cable needle gauge 3½ stitches = 1 in stockinette stitch on larger needles directions cast on 89 stitches with size 9 needle and knit every row for 7 row on next ws row place markers for pattern stitches as follows k4 pm k22 pm k10 pm k17 pm k10 pm k22 pm k4 change to size 10 needles and on the next row slipping markers as you come to them knit 4 garter border work double moss stitch to next marker starting with row 1 p2 k2 kf&b in each of the next two stitches k2 p2 work row 1 of heart panel to the next marker p2 k2 kf&b in each of the next two stitches k2 p2 work double moss stitch to next marker starting with row 1 k4 next row k4 then work row 2 of double moss stitch to next marker work row 2 of ltc row 2 of heart panel row 2 of rtc row 2 of double moss end with k4 now you are set up to work in patterns slipping all markers as you come to them and continuing each set of pattern row each row consists of k4 22 stitches in double moss stitch 12 stitches in right twist cable 17 stitches in heart panel 12 stitches in left twist cable 22 stitches in double moss stitch k4 remember to keep track of each pattern since all repeat at different rates all rs row are odd- numbered all ws row are even-numbered double moss stitch right twist cable rtc left twist cable ltc 1 k1 p1 repeat to end 1 p2 k8 p2 1 p2 k8 p2 2 k1 p1 repeat to end 2 k2 p8 k2 2 k2 p8 k2 3 p1 k1 repeat to end 3 p2 slip 4 stitches to 3 p2 slip 4 stitches to 4 p1 k1 repeat to end cable needle and hold cable needle and in back k4 k4 from hold in front k4 cable needle p2 k4 from cable 4 k2 p8 k2 needle p2 5 p2 k8 p2 4 k2 p8 k2 6 k2 p8 k2 5 p2 k8 p2 7 p2 k8 p2 6
